personal.name: Pratik Kumar
personal.title: Full Stack Developer & UI/UX Designer
personal.bio: I'm a passionate full-stack developer and designer with over 4 years of experience creating digital solutions that make a difference. My journey began with a curiosity about how things work, which led me to explore the fascinating world of technology and design.

projects.title: World of Human Cells
projects.description: An interactive educational platform exploring human cell biology with AI-powered chatbot, comprehensive cell information, research references, and interactive timelines. Features include cell comparison, search functionality, and PWA support.

projects.title: Zero Waste Lifestyle
projects.description: A comprehensive sustainability platform with AI-powered waste classification using Google Gemini Vision, LLaMA 3 chatbot, interactive recycling map, gamification system with badges, quiz engine, impact calculator, and real-time analytics dashboard. Built with Next.js and Supabase.

projects.title: EMS - Environmental Monitoring System
projects.description: IoT-based real-time environmental monitoring system using ESP8266 microcontroller with DHT11 temperature/humidity sensor and gas sensor. Features include WiFi connectivity, Flask REST API backend, Streamlit dashboard with interactive charts, LCD display, cloud data storage, and real-time analytics. Monitors air quality, temperature, and humidity with automatic data logging.

projects.title: BiomechAI
projects.description: Advanced biomechanics analysis platform combining ESP32 sensor data collection with AI-powered posture and gait analysis. Features real-time biomechanical assessment using MediaPipe pose detection, MPU6050 IMU sensor integration, Google Gemini AI chatbot for personalized recommendations, interactive dashboard with live data visualization, and comprehensive biomechanical reports. Enables real-time posture monitoring and gait pattern analysis.

projects.title: Travelian India
projects.description: AI-powered travel planning platform with multi-agent system using Google Gemini. Features intelligent itinerary generation, budget planning with multiple tiers, interactive maps with OpenStreetMap integration, real-time travel recommendations, and comprehensive travel planning. Built with React 19 and FastAPI backend, includes LangChain orchestration, MongoDB geo-based recommendations, and GSAP animations. Developed for Samsung PRISM GenAI Hackathon 2025.

projects.title: FloatChat - AI-Powered ARGO Ocean Data Analysis
projects.description: Intelligent conversational system for exploring and analyzing ARGO float oceanographic data using natural language queries. Features RAG (Retrieval-Augmented Generation) for natural language to SQL translation, interactive Streamlit dashboard with geospatial visualization, FastAPI RESTful backend, and trained LSTM/CNN models for ocean data prediction. Processes 6,514 NetCDF files with 6,178 ARGO float profiles covering temperature, salinity, pressure, and depth data across Indian, Southern, and Pacific Oceans. Optimized for 16GB M4 MacBook with memory-efficient chunked processing.

experience.description: Design user interfaces and experiences for web and mobile applications. Create wireframes, prototypes, and high-fidelity designs. Conduct user research and usability testing. Collaborate with development teams to ensure design implementation.

Lead design initiatives and mentor members in the Design domain. Organize design workshops, competitions, and events. Create user interfaces and experiences for society projects and events. Collaborate with cross-functional teams to deliver high-quality design solutions.
